name: Endless Void (Ryan)
description:
Title: Endless Void

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Endless Void is a side scrolling platformer. Run as far as you can in the randomly generated terrain! Collect gemstones for a boost in your score! Become an intergalactic legend, setting your high score among the stars!

Instructions: Press the Enter key to start or restart. Press space to jump.

Ryan Pederson – Game Designer
